snippet: Ben Simmons went from Down Under to the top of the NBA draft, and a record number of international players followed....
lead_paragraph: Ben Simmons went from Down Under to the top of the NBA draft, and a record number of international players followed.

headline.main: 76ers Take Ben Simmons With No. 1 Pick in NBA Draft
headline.print_headline: 76ers Take Ben Simmons With No. 1 Pick in NBA Draft
